These software packages all produce or consume tree sequences in the .trees file format.

Simulate

Create tree sequences from models of biological processes

msprime

A reimplementation of Hudsonâ€™s classical ms simulator for modern data sets.

https://github.com/tskit-dev/msprime
Documentation
Latest release: Dummy release to update docs 7 months and 2 weeks ago
Python package
30 contributors

SLiM

Selection on Linked Mutations: A forward population genetic simulation for studying linkage effects, such as hitchhiking, background selection, and Hill-Robertson interference.

https://github.com/MesserLab/SLiM
Documentation
11 contributors

fwdpy11

Forward-time simulation in Python using fwdpp

https://github.com/molpopgen/fwdpy11
Documentation
Latest release: Point release 1 month and 3 weeks ago
Python package
2 contributors

Infer

Create tree sequences from variation data

tsinfer

Infer a tree sequence from genetic variation data.

https://github.com/tskit-dev/tsinfer
Documentation
Latest release: Major feature release 3 weeks and 5 days ago
Python package
7 contributors

tsdate

Infer the age of ancestral nodes in a tree sequence.

https://github.com/tskit-dev/tsdate
Documentation
Latest release: 0.1.2 10 months and 2 weeks ago
Python package
3 contributors

Analyse

Measure key statistics, manipulate tree sequences and their underlying tables

tskit

Analyse, create and manipulate tree sequences.

https://github.com/tskit-dev/tskit
Documentation
Latest release: Python 0.3.4 1 month and 1 week ago
Python package
22 contributors
